content: togepi is approximately 9cm tall from the bottom of her feet to the tip of the front spike and 8 5cm in width from the tip of each arm and approximately 6 5cm from front to back she weighs 31grams this includes all materials used to make her 2mm hook stylecraft special dk in white and lemon 6mm black oval safety eyes blue and red felt black embroidery floss toy filling pins to place pieces before sewing together darning needle stitch markers i prefer using scrap yarn as stitch markers
